caseTitle: Ali Raza @ Peter, etc v. The State, etc
authorJudge: MR. JUSTICE QAZI MUHAMMAD AMIN AHMED
tagline: Retributive torture, that too by mobs through street justice, would not only have most de-humanizing impact on our society but also triggers chaos and anarchy as is evident in the present case besides being violative of Constitutional mandate. Vendetta cannot equate itself with justice. It is devoid of solemnity inherent in the process of law, leaving an offender as a victim, an object of sympathy at the end of the day, without judicial certainty about his guilt.
